Html:
Hello,

In AudioPlaybackPanel.cs -> OnPreVolumeMeter there's this line:
waveformPainter1.AddMax(e.MaxSampleValues[0]);
where e.MaxSampleValues[0] is a float number

Is there a way to get all these float numbers to an array without playing the audio/video?

In other words, how can I get the sound channel of a video without playing it, in order to analyse it?

Thank you,
Olga.
you just need something to keep calling Read on the output stream until it reaches the end (Read returns 0)
